var helper={getDatefromAtomicDate:function getDatefromAtomicDate(atomicDT){var atomicDate=(atomicDT+"").replace(/\D/g,"");return new Date(parseInt(atomicDate.substr(0,4)),parseInt(atomicDate.substr(4,2))-1,parseInt(atomicDate.substr(6,2)));},getAtomicDate:function getAtomicDate(dt){if(!dt||!(typeof dt.getMonth==='function'))return 0;return parseInt(dt.getFullYear()+""+("0"+(dt.getMonth()+1)).slice(-2)+""+("0"+dt.getDate()).slice(-2));},displayAtomicDate:function displayAtomicDate(dt){if(!dt)return"";var atomicDate=""+dt;if(atomicDate.length<8)return"";return atomicDate.substr(6,2)+"/"+atomicDate.substr(4,2)+"/"+atomicDate.substr(0,4);},displayCEP:function displayCEP(_v){if(!_v)return"";var v=_v+"";v=v.replace(/\D/g,"").substr(0,8);v=v.replace(/(\d{5})(\d)/,"$1-$2");return v;},displayMobile:function displayMobile(value){if(!value)return"";var v=value.toString();v="("+v.replace(/\D/g,"");//Remove tudo o que não é dígito
v=v.replace(/(\d{2})(\d)/,"$1) $2");//Coloca parênteses em volta dos dois primeiros dígitos
if(v.length>13)v=v.replace(/(\d{5})(\d)/,"$1-$2");//Coloca hífen entre o quarto e o quinto dígitos
else v=v.replace(/(\d{4})(\d)/,"$1-$2");//Coloca hífen entre o quarto e o quinto dígitos
return v;},displayKilometragem:function displayKilometragem(value){if(!value)return"";var v=value.toString();v=v+" Mil";return v;},displayCNPJ:function displayCNPJ(_v){if(!_v)return"";var v=_v+"";v=v.replace(/\D/g,"").substr(0,14);if(v.length<6){v=v.replace(/(\d{2})(\d)/,"$1.$2");}else if(v.length<9){v=v.replace(/(\d{2})(\d{3})(\d)/,"$1.$2.$3");}else if(v.length<10){v=v.replace(/(\d{2})(\d{3})(\d{3})(\d{1})/,"$1.$2.$3/$4");}else if(v.length<11){v=v.replace(/(\d{2})(\d{3})(\d{3})(\d{2})/,"$1.$2.$3/$4");}else if(v.length<12){v=v.replace(/(\d{2})(\d{3})(\d{3})(\d{3})/,"$1.$2.$3/$4");}else if(v.length<13){v=v.replace(/(\d{2})(\d{3})(\d{3})(\d{4})/,"$1.$2.$3/$4");}else if(v.length<14){v=v.replace(/(\d{2})(\d{3})(\d{3})(\d{4})(\d{1})/,"$1.$2.$3/$4-$5");}else{v=v.replace(/(\d{2})(\d{3})(\d{3})(\d{4})(\d{2})/,"$1.$2.$3/$4-$5");}//v=v.replace(/(\d{2})(\d{3})(\d{3})(\d{4})(\d{2})/g,"\$1.\$2.\$3\/\$4\-\$5");
return v;},displayCPF:function displayCPF(_v){if(!_v)return"";var v=_v+"";v=v.replace(/\D/g,"").substr(0,11);//Remove tudo o que não é dígito
v=v.replace(/(\d{3})(\d)/,"$1.$2");//Coloca um ponto entre o terceiro e o quarto dígitos
v=v.replace(/(\d{3})(\d)/,"$1.$2");//Coloca um ponto entre o terceiro e o quarto dígitos
//de novo (para o segundo bloco de números)
v=v.replace(/(\d{3})(\d{1,2})$/,"$1-$2");//Coloca um hífen entre o terceiro e o quarto dígitos
return v;},Post:function Post(url,sendData,showLoading,cb){fetch(url,{method:'POST',headers:{'Accept':'application/json','Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(sendData)}).then(function(res){return res.json();}).then(function(data){return cb(false,data);}).catch(function(err){return cb(err);});},Get:function Get(url,sendData,showLoading,cb){fetch(url+"?"+new URLSearchParams(sendData)).then(function(res){return res.json();}).then(function(data){return cb(false,data);}).catch(function(err){return cb(err);});}};export default helper;
